title: (4301) Architect Designed Brand New 3 Storied House Available For Sale Thalawatugoda
details: Architect Designed Brand New 2 Storied House Available for Sale. Thalawatugoda, 4 Bedrooms, 4 Bathrooms all With Shower Cubicles, Toto fittings and Granite tops. 3 Phase electricity, Pipeline Water With overhead Tank, Hot Water- Pantrie, Pantry Cupboards With Granite tops Remote Control Gate Parking for 2 Vehicles Servant Room and Bathrooms front and back Landscape Garden. Rs : 265 Negotiable 26.5 Million
